978280.name: Damn Zombies
978280.description:
Welcome to the zombie apocalypse experience of a lifetime – and now more beautiful than ever. Caught in the midst of an epic zombie outbreak in a dead city and dark corridors, your only thought is: Survive!

Features



  • Face the grotesque hordes – Zombies are brought to life with a horrifyingly realistic wet gore effect as they react in real time taking instant visible damage, making every bullet count.

  • First-Person Action – Players will play as a soldier who has to fix the consequences of a virus leak from which all living things died out

  • Linear plot of the game with corridor levels

  • An incredible story that captures from the very beginning

  • A large number of weapons with which you can destroy large groups of zombies
